net.sf.mmm.util.bean.api.mapping

Interface PojoBeanMapper<P,B extends Bean>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - the base type of the Pojos to convert (e.g. Object or Entity).
    B - the base type of the Bean to map (e.g. Bean or EntityBean).
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GenericPojoBeanMapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPojoBeanMapper, GenericPojoBeanMapperImpl

    public interface PojoBeanMapper<P,B extends Bean>
    This is the interface used to map instances from a hierarchy of POJOs to amd from a corresponding hierarchy of Beans. E.g. it will be used to map from FooEntity to FooBean or from BarBean to BarEntity. To map from a fixed generic container object see DocumentBeanMapper instead.
    Since:
    8.0.0
    Author:
    hohwille

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends P>
      T      		 fromBean(B bean, Class<T> type) 
      <T extends B>
      T      		 toBean(P pojo, T prototype) 

    • Method Detail

      • toBean

        <T extends B> T toBean(P pojo,
                       T prototype)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type of the Bean to map to.
        Parameters:
        pojo - the Pojo to map.
        prototype - the Bean prototype.
        Returns:
        a Bean-instance of the given prototype with the properties mapped from the given Pojo.

      • fromBean

        <T extends P> T fromBean(B bean,
                         Class<T> type)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type of the Pojo to map to.
        Parameters:
        bean - the Bean to map.
        type - the Class reflecting the Pojo to map to.
        Returns:
        the a new instance of the given Class with the properties mapped from the given Bean.
